page.title: 15RECREATION,LEISURE CENTRE
page.content: The{Valley Leisure Centre}is a lovely area just below Cave Hill. It is a large building surrounded by lots of playing fields. It is right on the edge of Rathcoole housing estate on the Church Road. There are many different things inside it. There are three levels. On the first level you can go swimming _ there is a learner pool and a pool for swimmers. There is also a large hall which is marked out for many sports like,badminton,tennis or football. On the second level there are squash courts,a gym,viewing for the swimming,a restaurant,computer games and a sauna and solarium. On the third level there is an indoor bowling green,snooker and darts. They also have facilities for the handicapped. I'm a member of the centre and it's a great place to go.
